summary: A documentary on the Baja 1000, an annual off-road race held in Baja, Mexico that attracts hundreds of racers, their souped-up machines, and thousands of fans.
cast: Mario Andretti|Sal Fish|James Garner|Robby Gordon|Billy Hammon|Ricky Johnson|Mike McCoy|Chad McQueen|Steve McQueen|J.N. Roberts|Jimmy N. Roberts|Rick Shuster|Lance Strumpf
title: Dust to Glory
